welcome: Welcome to your country's ({government}) 7th National Report overview. please select option to proceed.
validationErrorsMessage: Please ensure that all records marked in red are completed, as there is still mandatory information missing in some of your record(s).
successfulMessage: Your request to publish your country's 7th national report has been received.
successMessageNau: Your request to publish will be sent to your country's NFP who has rights to publish.
successMessagePA: Since there are number of records it will take few minutes to published them all.
confirmationMessage: Are you sure you want to proceed with publishing your countries 7th national report?
spinnerMessage: Please wait while we process your request.
briefOverviewOfProcess: Brief overview of the process of preparation of the report
sectionIIDescription: Status of the revised or updated national biodiversity strategies
assessmentOfProgressNationalTargets: Assessment of progress towards national targets
sectionIVDescription: Assessment of national progress towards the goals and targets of the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework
conclusionsImplementationConvention: Conclusions on the national implementation of the Convention and the Kunming-Montreal Global Biodiversity Framework
sectionOtherInfoDescription: Information as requested in related decisions adopted by the Conference of the Parties at its fifteenth meeting
missingIndicatorFieldsMessage: Please ensure that all records marked in red are completed, as there is still mandatory information missing in some of your record(s).
missingIndicatorDataMessage: You have not yet added any indicator data for following indicators. Please add the data before proceeding.
pdfInfo: Click on preview to generate PDF or print NR7
infoMessage: The progress shown in this section is for informational purposes only. It may differ slightly from the actual data you have provided. Minor differences can be ignored—this feature is simply intended to give you an overall sense of how far the country has progressed in entering information in NR7. For accurate confirmation of any missing information, please use the validation button above, which provides the final and authoritative status of your submission.
progressInfo: The progress shown in this section is for informational purposes only. It may differ slightly from the actual data you have provided. Minor differences can be ignored—this feature is simply intended to give you an overall sense of how far the country has progressed in entering information in NR7.
validationProgressInfo: For accurate confirmation of any missing information, please use the validation button above, which provides the final and authoritative status of your submission.
duplicateRecordMessage: This record is a duplicate of another record in the system. Please review and delete one of the records before proceeding.
